website_summaries.verdict: An efficient container built of plastic that won't puncture and transports with ease.
pros: Small in size, yet efficient in its ability to safely dispose of hazardous waste, including needles
High marks for the company's customer service
Customers appreciate the adaptable size as well
cons: Few reports that the lid could fit more tightly

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy container
customer_reviews.text: I am a type 1 diabetic who wears a pump and a glucose monitor. I have a lot of medical waste at my house, including needles. This box is nice and sturdy, which is very important to me. I do not want to contribute to medical waste in the environment. It is a little small for my needs, though. I bought two of them and haven't opened them yet, but my guess is that they will fill up in no time. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is the size.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: This little container appears to be properly labeled and lidded to keep the contents contained and people safe from anything that might be in there. I'm currently only using it to store used lancets from blood sugar testing, so even with the small size it's going to last quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Kallah

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed...what we received is flimsy and not well made at all. Cheap plastic. Very sorry we wasted our money on this.
customer_reviews.author: SonallB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for microblading purpose
customer_reviews.text: This sharps container is perfect for what I need it for. I put microblading needles in it so I needed a small container and even with this it's going to take a while to fill. This container is small and more compact. I use it in the salon so I wish it mounted on the wall like bigger ones do. It would be nice if the company would create a small bracket for it but not a big deal, I will probably purchase a little shelf or something keep it on the wall and from getting knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi G.

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: The lid was a little difficult to click in, but it finally did. I got this for my monthly auto-injections. Turns out, the injectors are longer than the container by just a tad. I may need to end up getting a different one since this one won't hold too many.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product I’m about six months pregnant and I have diabetes so I’m required to take insulin four times a day I also have a six-year-old at home and all the needles can be overwhelming so it’s really good that I have a sharps container just to dispose of all of my needles and my products that I use to keep them safe around my house I would definitely recommend this product ,it kind of fits anywhere it’s pretty compact but also holds a lot
customer_reviews.author: Annette Archer

customer_reviews.title: Sharps Disposal
customer_reviews.text: Great little container for those of us who do not need giant, hospital-sized disposal containers. Fits unobtrusively on my nightstand! It will last for several months, I believe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Penny J. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I need a shot every month and needed to somehow dispose of needles. Then things changed and I know longer needed it. I ended up sending it back and it cost me almost as much to return it as what I purchased it for. Knowing that now I would have never ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described, secure way to collect sharps.
customer_reviews.text: Although it was smaller than I had anticipated (if I read the measurements I would have known that!) it is perfect for my needs. Great way to collects and safely store.
customer_reviews.author: skny68

customer_reviews.title: nice box
customer_reviews.text: luckily I only need to dispose of glucose test strips and lancets, so this will last awhile, but if I need another I will get this kind. And if I am asked, I will gladly recommend this product. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Sharps container
customer_reviews.text: Usmaller than I was expecting but sturdy and will suffice. Very prompt delivery
customer_reviews.author: paulaperk

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Very small and much smaller than I thought but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M 💕

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to break where it's supposed to lock, and it's not safe for use at all!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kita

customer_reviews.title: Its little
customer_reviews.text: I thought tjis was larger. You need to put a size. This too small
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile container for various items disposal
customer_reviews.text: Good size container for various size items. Top design is handy for handsfree detaching of needles etc. I use it daily for my diabetic supplies disposal. Lid seems to feel a bit cheaply made, not sure how long the small plastic clips will last with multiple daily use. So far so good, the only knock on a otherwise very well put together product.
customer_reviews.author: JJDeezy

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Description says quart size and it’s actually pint size, but it will work
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Just want I needed
customer_reviews.text: Product satisfied in terms of size and quality. It would be helpful through to add a little “how to” in the box confirming the correct way to put the sharp in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Claudene Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price and quality...
customer_reviews.text: This sharps container pretty much served its purpose. It’s made of thick material and the lid is very secure once it’s clipped on. I thought it was bigger so I actually needed to buy two to dispose of my sharps, but that’s totally my fault! The price of the container is also fair. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Quezada

customer_reviews.title: Good producr
customer_reviews.text: My little dog is a diabetic. I use this container for her sharps.
customer_reviews.author: Annette DeFino

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for as it is nice and small and is perfect for my INR testing.
customer_reviews.author: robynl

customer_reviews.title: works for what you need it for....
customer_reviews.text: The only think that is a negative is the two small lids are connected and cannot be closed individually. Otherwise, if you need a small sharps container that isn't going to take up a lot of space, you will be good with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R.

customer_reviews.title: Does not seal well after use
customer_reviews.text: Does not close well, if not kept upright, seals open, very flimsy as to the seal cover
customer_reviews.author: Ilikemyprivacy!

customer_reviews.title: Definite Winner.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sharps container. Easy to use and is a safe way to dispose of used needles. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use this product for my son's insulin pen needles. Perfect size if you are traveling as well as home use. Fits plenty of pen needle tips.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Necessary
customer_reviews.text: Keep contaminated away from kids and pets and dispose of properly.

customer_reviews.title: Size of this is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this fits in my medication bag nicely. Nice small size so my sharps, my pen, medication and all my other needed supplies fit in one bag.
customer_reviews.author: WASHKITCHEN

customer_reviews.title: Great items!
customer_reviews.text: Like the convenience of having a unit to store the used sharps. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gartrell

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought but that isn’t a big deal
customer_reviews.text: As the title said, smaller than I thought (I’ve never bought a sharps container before) but it still did what I needed it to do. So no complaints on my end.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it’s not very good quality. Atleast the kid isn’t. The top doesn’t latch correctly. I’ve decided not to use it as it just won’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hvb1992

customer_reviews.title: Biohazard Container
customer_reviews.text: Received just as I expected- however there is no info on where to mail the canister to properly dispose of it .
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: A good size container
customer_reviews.text: It works well, just like the other one I used.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: AdirMed Needle Disposal Container
customer_reviews.text: Nice & compact, although smaller than expected. Bought for the price. The plastic lid is easy to open and snap closed, however, it will not stay closed. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: PammieC

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall
customer_reviews.text: It seemed different in picture. I did not look close enough for where we can remove the pen needle into container, is not there. Good product for those who pay better attention when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine McElreath

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as 1 quart which I thought would be fine. But there were no other dimensions listed, and it turns out to be too short for my meds. It is only 6" high and my needle is almost 6 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and simple to use. The delivery came with no problems. Perfect, sturdy container.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Very useful small sharpie box for home use
customer_reviews.text: Very useful small sharpie box for home use or for small syringes for botox or insulin
customer_reviews.author: Iraez

customer_reviews.title: Nice container
customer_reviews.text: Nice container for my insulin needles. The container holds a lot of used needles.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kochis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and closes tight. For me it was a great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Nice color  and good look.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shape and color, but just the cover is hard to open and close, and shows non durable.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised

customer_reviews.title: A good product (item) to have when dealing with any kind of medical needles

customer_reviews.title: 👍❤️

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Easy to tuck into a corner so it’s not an eyesore. Perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small sharps container for our farm and this is the perfect size and price. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: A. Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! It’s been good to me so far! A great product, and was at a great price! Now I can microneedle and dermaplane! Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: shyanne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for tattoo needles. Very small container you can put anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time, in fact a little early
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and I’m using it now, good sharps container
customer_reviews.author: mnm

customer_reviews.title: Good size for pen needles
customer_reviews.text: I like the 2 different openings that will accommodate different size needles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered:)
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for what I needed it for, and was exactly what I wanted:)
customer_reviews.author: Jane Katzer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and serves its purpose. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped quicly, perfect size for what i need it for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty uninteresting product, not much to wax rhapsodic about, but it works well and the price is good. Note that this product is strictly the sharps container and DOES NOT include disposal. There are usually free needle disposal options in your community so always look into those before paying a bunch extra for a product that includes shipping back for disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A little improvement would be better!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is awesome in the fact that you properly dispose of hazardous razors and other materials. One thing i would recommend changing is the closing lid because once you close it its completely closed unless you pry it open again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need better variety of hole size for syringes
customer_reviews.text: Just started to use container, size is perfect, square is good, had round before. Don’t care for the openings, I suppose the round opening is good for sharps. I use it for disposal of 1 cc TB type syring. Does not fit through round opening, had to use the large square one. So anyone and reach in and get a syring. Also as the box fills, don’t know if they will spill out. Have to see. A sharps container lasts a long time with once a week injections, so don’t know how this will work. Need different size holes
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Recently needed to take weekly injections. This container looked like irate would fit the bill for my needs. I was 100% right. Perfect size makes unobtrusive while still securing needles. Seller communication and follow was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C

customer_reviews.title: Quality container at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Good size if you just take shots once a month. Quality container. Great price. Only suggestion for improvement is slight modification to the flap you open to put in your used syringes. Would be nice if it was a push tab to open.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mackie

customer_reviews.title: How about a different snap on cover
customer_reviews.text: Well the porduct is a perfect size for a small space. I think there should be a different way of closing the individual covers. Once you push down the individual covers it is hard to reopen, and then you finally get it open the little snap breaks off.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey Dazey

customer_reviews.title: Very small and broke
customer_reviews.text: This isn't sturdy. It broke when I was closing it. I cannot use this item.
customer_reviews.author: Agordon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Nice container and perfect size to put my used needles in. And the price was right to.
customer_reviews.author: Robc

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Great container for those of us who do not need hospital-sized disposal containers. Fits unobtrusively on my nightstand! It will last for several months – I think
customer_reviews.author: Opus

customer_reviews.title: Good value for sharps container
customer_reviews.text: The lid is a bit flimsy can't see it lasting long. But for me, I live with my wife, no children so isok
customer_reviews.author: Ksalerno

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It arrived on time! I have to give myself monthly injections for my migraines and this was exactly what I was looking for when I couldn’t find anything locally. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: John T. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and space-saving.
customer_reviews.text: While I could ultimately use one that is bigger, this is a perfect fit for our space. I like the secure seal that will close it when it is full.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Grupsmith

customer_reviews.title: Good sharps container
customer_reviews.text: I am a diabetic and use the container to dispose of sharps. It is good and identical to the container handed out for free at our local disposal site.
customer_reviews.author: Fenwick Barnum

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Travel Size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect travel size. Took it on a cruise for disposing of glucometer test strips. Lids are very secure and easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't worth the money piece of junk it would not stay shut

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: We are using this just for disposal of needle tips and it can hold a ton. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Willisrad

customer_reviews.title: Compact size
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my needs. I was tired of having to purchase huge disposals for my minimal needs.
customer_reviews.author: A Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Started to give IV hydration to one of our fur babies and I could not find a sharps container locally. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: James L Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small sharps container and this one is the perfect size. Came quickly and as described. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Top quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits the need perfectly nd for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Indymike1

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only thing I would change is the notch that connects both lids together on the top so that they can both swing separately. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John Marvin

customer_reviews.title: I like the size
customer_reviews.text: I really needed this for my syringes and I like that it’s not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Marleen

customer_reviews.title: Compact needle disposal
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect for what I need. Just the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Siefert

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and useful
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for size for the needles used. Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Drake

product_meta.title: AdirMed Sharps & Needle Bio-Hazard Disposal Container 1 Quart - 1 Pack
product_meta.description: The disposal of needles and other sharps waste is a public health and safety issue. Sharps must be properly disposed of, to prevent injury as well as the spread of infectious diseases to healthcare workers, patients and the general public. Made of strong, puncture-resistant plastic to eliminate the risk of catching sharps' stings, this AdirMed 1-Quart Sharps and Needle Biohazard Container ensures secure disposal of sharps waste. Its split-lid design and dual openings protect against accidental exposure and unauthorized removal of used and discarded items. This biohazard container comes in 1-, 3- and 6-count packs to accommodate your needs. Each container is labeled with a biohazard warning and equipped with usage instructions, and is outfitted with a transparent cover to offer a view of the fill-level progress to reduce overfilling. Transportable and handy, this 1-quart container can be used for safe disposal of needles, syringes, vacutainers, pen needles, lancets, blades (razors, scalpels, etc.) pipettes, glass slides and the like. They’re ideal for use in an office setting by phlebotomists (health care professionals who draw blood) or at home by diabetics who need to dispose of sharps waste. Made to bring awe to its clients, the AdirMed is designed to allow temporary closure for safety, and snap locks for final disposal. This all-new container will bring comfort and convenience to any home or workplace, boasting outstanding and excellent features to make it one of the most dependable and reliable containers in the market.
feature_bullets: DURABLE CONSTRUCTION. Sharps must be properly disposed to prevent the spread of infectious diseases and eliminate the risk of catching sharps' stings. To ensure secure disposal of sharps waste, this container is made using sturdy, puncture-resistant plastic.

LIGHTWEIGHT AND COMPACT- Transportable, handy and safe to use, this 1-quart container is perfect for disposing large amounts of used sharps safely. Use it for safe disposal of needles, syringes, vacutainers, pen needles, lancets, blades (razors, scalpels, etc.) pipettes, glass slides and the like.

PROTECTIVE OPENING - Accommodating used sharps waste, this container is designed with a split-lid design and dual openings to protect against accidental exposure and unauthorized removal of used and discarded items.
FITS ALL SIZE NEEDLES - Large opening accommodates bigger syringes. This Sharps container works great for people with Diabetes who need to be regularly monitored.
LARGE STORAGE SPACE- Horizontal drop maximizes container volume which allows for frequent use without concern of emptying needle container often **Prop 65 Warning - Lead and DHCP**
